ygData.subject: RE: anaglyphs
ygData.msgSnippet: what the definition means is 3D glasses. red on the left, blue (contrasts red) on the right :) of course, the infra/ultra vision goggles are close enough to
ygData.messageBody:
what the definition means is 3D glasses. red on the left, blue (contrasts
red) on the right :)

of course, the infra/ultra vision goggles are close enough to that
principal. nice work. i never thought to look up the word.

this leaves us with a few possibilities. the one which i think may be most
possible is that this is groundwork, and the actual product made from this
is not as of yet in game. keep it up gnomes! i'm soon to be 16th and i'm
eager to help with the knowledge quest!

Xiltik
15 Rogue
E'ci

Gimbelstan's journal mentions that the Gemcutter is used to make pearl
anaglyphs.

2 : a stereoscopic motion or still picture in which the right component of a
composite image usually red in color is superposed on the left component in
a contrasting color to produce a three-dimensional effect when viewed
through correspondingly colored filters in the form of spectacles
